title: UAE residents outsourcing their brains to AI: Are we losing our minds?
summary_full: UAE residents are increasingly integrating AI chatbots into daily life, from shopping and work to complex decision-making. With adoption rates among the world's highest, generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Copilot are becoming everyday aides, enhancing productivity and personal planning. This shift signifies a growing reliance on AI for cognitive tasks, transforming how people learn, decide and interact.
